alert.note: Alert for Allen; Beauregard; Calcasieu; Jefferson Davis; Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 5:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Rapides, northwestern Jefferson Davis, eastern Beauregard, northeastern Calcasieu, southeastern Vernon and Allen Parishes through 530 AM CST... At 500 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sugartown to near Ragley. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kinder, Elizabeth, Reeves, Dry Creek, Pitkin, Sugartown, Mittie, Ragley, De Quincy, Grant, Longville, Buller, Harmony, Fullerton, Topsy, Gillis, Tulla, Leblanc, Cravens and Union Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Beauregard; Calcasieu; Jefferson Davis; Rapides; Vernon
